title: Font Encoder - A Encoding Generator for FontLab
content:
![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150414233429im_/http:/typophile.com/files/og-image_6131.png)

Hello to all!

I've just went live with a simple tool to generate encoding text for FontLab.

It's still in a very early stage (I'm sorry if it's still too painful), but I want to share it with you guys in order to have feedback/suggestions.

Here's the link: [http://lab.scannerlicker.net/font-encoder/](http://web.archive.org/web/20150414233429/http:/lab.scannerlicker.net/font-encoder/)

Cheers!
author: scannerlicker
